Hello! I'm a simple website.

Welcome to the Chaos

This website is infected by WebCorrupter.js. That means this website will get corrupted really soon.

What will happen

The website will start glitching, text starts randomly switching colors, and more.

Features of WebCorrupter.js

  • Random text color changes
  • Element shuffling
  • Unexpected animations
  • And many more surprises!

Warning: This demo is for educational purposes only. The effects can be disorienting.
